job.title: Jr. Software Engineer
job.industry: Hospital & Health Care,Information Technology and Services
job.description: pWe are looking for a Backend Software Engineer to join our Integrations team Offering 30hr on a 6month Contract w ability for perm conversionppbrppMinimum QualificationsppbrppBachelors degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering or related fieldppProficiency with software developmentppFamiliarity with agile principles like continuous build test integration and deploymentppbrppPreferred Qualificationsppbrpp2 years experience as a member of a software development teamppSkilled knowledge and experience developing and maintaining data communication systems and architectureppAbility to develop and troubleshoot data flow processes translation mapsppKnowledge of Web Services RESTful API developmentppExperience with GoLang or another programming languageppExperience with cloud development with AWS Azure or other cloud providers is a plusppKnowledge of relational databases PostgreSQL or other relationalppExperience with Docker and development of containerized applicationsppFamiliarity with FHIR and healthcare interoperability standards is a plusp
